import React from "react"; import { Button, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaRegCheckCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; import ModalPizzas from "../../components/modal"; import NavLateral from "../../components/navLateral"; import logoPizzaria from '../../assets/pizzaria_giuseppe.png' import CardPedido from "../../components/cards/cardPedido"; import useAuth from "../../hooks/useAuth"; import './pedidosUserStyle.css' export default function PedidosUser(){ const { listaPedidos } = useAuth(); const tempo = Date.now() const hoje = new Date(tempo) const response = listaPedidos console.log(response) fetch(pedidosListados) .then((data) => data.json()) .then((data) => console.log(data)) return(
